Uses of Class
com.mapgroup.classificator.controller.ContextRequest

  • Packages that use ContextRequest 
    Package Description
    com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary  
    com.mapgroup.classificator.controller  

    • Uses of ContextRequest in com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary

      Methods in com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary that return ContextRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private ContextRequest MultiServer.generateContextRequest(ClientRequest clientRequest)
      Generates a specific structure according to the client's request which contains all the information for the current context in which the request is done.
      Methods in com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary with parameters of type ContextRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void MultiServer.updateServerData(ContextRequest context)
      Updates the server main data according to the specified context structure resulting from the latest computation.

    • Uses of ContextRequest in com.mapgroup.classificator.controller

      Methods in com.mapgroup.classificator.controller with parameters of type ContextRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerResponse ValidateMailExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Checks the correctness of the mail address contained in the specified structure.
      ServerResponse UploadExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Manages the upload request made by the user and provides a way in order to save the file that the user want to upload in a specific folder of the server.
      ServerResponse TreeSerializerExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Serializes the decision tree contained in the structure specified in a specific file whose name is contained in the contextRequest structure.
      ServerResponse SupportedExtExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Returns a server response which contains the list of all the available file extension which are supported by the program, that are used in order to save the dataset loaded in memory.
      ServerResponse SendMailExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Sends an email to the addressees present in a specific structure contained in the specified structure contextRequest, from the user's email address with the report of the prediction session.
      ServerResponse PredictionExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Satisfies the user's request of predicting a class value using the structure which contains all the user's choices and uses them to predict the correct class value contained in the decision tree specified in the context structure passed to the method.
      ServerResponse LoadTreeExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Loads from a file, whose name is contained in the specified structure, a serialized tree and starts from it the learning process.
      ServerResponse IServerExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Returns the response resulting from the computation on the specified data contained in the structure which represents the context in which the operation will be done.
      ServerResponse DatabaseExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Generates the decision tree from the dataset saved in a database table whose name is specified by the user.
      ServerResponse ConvertExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Converts the dataset contained in the specified request in the specific dataset format specified by the user.
      ServerResponse ConnectionCloserExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Sending a specific context structure which contains the current context information, asks to the server to close the current connection with the specified host and prints all the result of the operation on a specific panel.
      ServerResponse AvailableDatExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Retrieves all the files's name in which are saved the serialized decision tree and insert them in the server response structure which is returned to the client.
      ServerResponse AttrInfoSenderExecutor.executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Generates all the information about the attributes and save them in a specific structure that is added to the server response returned by the method.
